_header: Come follow me my friends unto hell
Title(s): ‘A vysion of saules þat war dampned’
_description: ‘A vysion of saules þat war dampned’ — nine quatrains interspersed with prose

BLAdd37049.First Lines: Cum folow me my frendes vnto helle Ay to dwelle…
